trans-unit.resname: P11·1 | Day of Judgment | Card Text
P11·2 | Brave the Elements | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Choose a color. White creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.
Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card, then put all cards revealed this way into your hand.

Searing Blaze deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls. Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, Searing Blaze deals 3 damage to that player or planeswalker and 3 damage to that creature instead.

trans-unit.resname: P11·8 | Hero of Bladehold | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.) Whenever Hero of Bladehold attacks, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.

trans-unit.resname: P11·96 | Glissa, the Traitor | Card Text
trans-unit.source: First strike, deathtouch Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
